Text.Page:
We could mollify Lennert a little, though, if we collected the cut timber that the last crew left behind when they fled or died.

And by "we," I mean "you."

Check down at the bottom of the hill and bring back what timber you can.

That's more timber than I thought! I'll measure and bundle it, and Lennert can make some progress against his precious "quota."

Thanks, , and if you ever muster out of the military, look me up. We can always use more loggers around here.

My last crew must have left a full day's work down there when the centaurs came. It shouldn't be hard to find.

I mean...you know what wood looks like, right?
